alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:19AM CDT until April 20 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southern Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 419 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleveland, or near Belton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Leawood, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Grain Valley, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Peculiar, Lake Lotawana, Lake Winnebago, Lone Jack, Cleveland, East Lynne, Lake Annette, Baldwin Park, Strasburg and Gunn City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 22 and 29. Interstate 470 between mile markers 3 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
